short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Evoking the beauty of nature and the peace of rural life.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension transforms your new tab into a vibrant scene of blooming flowers under a clear blue sky, giving your browsing experience a refreshing and uplifting atmosphere. Perfect for those who love the serenity of nature and the joy of endless flower fields.
